text:
© Getty (Photo by James Devaney/GC Images)

He's newly hitched to Hailey Baldwin.

And for now, that's enough for Justin Bieber, who is planning on taking a break from making music to enjoy married life.

A source told People magazine that the Baby singer was enjoying a 'season of self discovery'.



© Provided by Associated Newspapers Limited All change: Justin Bieber is taking a break from music to enjoy a 'season of self-discovery' with new wife Hailey

'He's happy and content,' the source told the publication. 'He is in love with Hailey. She encourages him to do whatever he wants to do, and is encouraging him in this season of self-discovery.'

Although he's just 24, Bieber was 13 when he was discovered and has worked ever since.

The source: 'He has worked for years, and the first time he takes a significant break, everyone's all, "When's he coming back?" To Justin, those aren't just questions — those are demands.'

© Getty (Photo by Matthew Sperzel/Getty Images)



Bieber has been pictured looking tearful while with new wife Hailey on various occasions in recent months.

The two surprised fans when they had a low key court house wedding back in September.

Since then Bieber has cemented their commitment by getting his face tattooed.

The Love Yourself hitmaker and Hailey had matching inkings, and the Canadian superstar opted for a 'thin and delicate' design next to his eyebrow.

© Provided by Associated Newspapers Limited Newly wed: The two surprised fans when they had a low key court house wedding back in September; they are seen September 17

Celebrity tattoo artist Bang Bang - whose real name is Keith McCurdy - told Page Six TV: 'They each got a tattoo. Justin's tattoo is on his face... It's really thin and delicate. And [it's] also not a traditional couples' tattoo.'

It has been suggested the tiny tattoo is of the word Grace, and another tattoo artist, JonBoy - who previously created another near-invisible facial inking for Justin - recently shared a photo of the Never Say Never hitmaker and the 23-year-old model which was captioned Style&Grace.

Related Slideshow : Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin out and about together (Provided by Photo Services)
title: Justin Bieber is taking a break from music to enjoy a 'season of self-discovery' with new wife Hailey

meta_data.description: He's newly hitched to Hailey Baldwin. And for now, that's enough for Justin Bieber, who is planning on taking a break from making music to enjoy married life.
